name: fosscord-server
description: Fosscord complete selfhostable open source discord-compatible server

scripts.build: npm run build:cdn && npm run build:gateway && npm run build:api && tsc -b .
scripts.bundle:macos: npx caxa -i . -m 'This may take a while to run the first time, please wait...' --output 'fosscord-server.app' -- '{{caxa}}/node_modules/.bin/node' '{{caxa}}/dist/start.js' && tar -czf 'fosscord-server-macos.app.tgz' 'fosscord-server.app'
scripts.bundle:linux: npx caxa -i . -m 'This may take a while to run the first time, please wait...' --output 'fosscord' -- '{{caxa}}/node_modules/.bin/node' '{{caxa}}/dist/start.js' && tar -czf 'fosscord-server-linux.tgz' 'fosscord'
scripts.bundle:windows: npx caxa -i . -m "This may take a while to run the first time, please wait..." --output "fosscord-server-windows.exe" -- "{{caxa}}/node_modules/.bin/node" "{{caxa}}/dist/start.js"
